### Tutor 04

> Template Inheritance in Liquid

* Custom Output: YAML, JSON

* List Tree: Archives: By Year, By Year and Month

* List Tree: Tags and Categories

* Partials: Blog List, Terms, Archive

* New Layout: Index (extends Page)

* New: Markdown

* New: Shortcode

-- -- --
